Интерактивный путеводитель по немецким м: Interactive guide to German places in Ukraine
Выбирайте город или село, смотрите видео: Choose a city or village, watch a video, find traces of German history in Ukraine and listen to author's excursions
Совет немцев Украины – это главный коорд: The Council of Germans in Ukraine is the main coordinating body representing the interests of ethnic Germans in Ukraine. The organization is engaged in cultural, language, educational, youth and social projects, as well as developing partnerships between Ukraine and Germany.
Цель этого приложения – показать большое:
The purpose of this application is to show the great cultural heritage of the Germans who lived in Ukraine and to popularize German history and culture in Ukraine. Use the built-in map to learn interesting facts about the German colonies, cities, historical buildings, and numerous places associated with German artists, writers, musicians, and more.

Information, graphic and video materials, as well as audio guides in Ukrainian, German and Russian are available for each location. In addition, you will find video tours of former German colonies and cities such as Odessa, Kharkiv, Lviv or Lutsk recorded by local guides.
